description:
To save video to your computer, you'll need to download it. To download a copy of your video, you'll have to start from the play page for your video. Once you're on the page, click on 'Download' from the bottom-left corner and get your video downloaded automatically in mp4 format. 


Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to save your video to your computer:


 



If you're not able to save it with the procedure, follow the following method:

Once you're on the page, click on 'Download' from the bottom-left corner and get your video downloaded automatically in mp4 format.      Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to save your video to your computer:              If you're not able to save it with the procedure, follow the following method:
title: How do I save my video to my computer?
